00069 # Import stuff
00070 
00071 
00072 import gtk
00073 import cairo
00074 import pango
00075 import micropolisengine
00076 import micropolisview
00077 import micropolisnoticeview
00078 import micropolisdrawingarea
00079 
00080 ########################################################################
00081 # MicropolisNoticePanel
00082 
00083 
00084 class MicropolisNoticePanel(gtk.Frame):
00085 
00086 
00087     def __init__(
00088         self,
00089         engine=None,
00090         centerOnTileHandler=None,
00091         **args):
00092 
00093         gtk.Frame.__init__(
00094             self,
00095             **args)
00096 
00097         self.engine = engine
00098         self.mapViewVisible = False
00099 
00100         engine.expressInterest(
00101             self,
00102             ('gameMode',))
00103 
00104         # Views
00105 
00106         hpaned1 = gtk.HPaned()
00107         self.hpaned1 = hpaned1
00108         self.add(hpaned1)
00109 
00110         self.noticeView = micropolisnoticeview.MicropolisNoticeView(
00111             engine=engine,
00112             setMapViewVisible=self.setMapViewVisible)
00113 
00114         hpaned1.pack1(self.noticeView, resize=False, shrink=False)
00115 
00116         mapView = micropolisdrawingarea.NoticeMicropolisDrawingArea(
00117             engine=engine,
00118             centerOnTileHandler=centerOnTileHandler)
00119         self.mapView = mapView
00120         mapView.set_size_request(150, -1)
00121         mapView.visible = False
00122         hpaned1.pack2(mapView, resize=False, shrink=False)
00123 
00124         hpaned1.set_position(1000)
00125 
00126 
00127     def update(self, name, *args):
00128 
00129         engine = self.engine
00130 
00131         if name == 'gameMode':
00132             
00133             self.updateMapViewAdded()
00134 
00135 
00136     def updateMapViewAdded(self):
00137         engine = self.engine
00138         mapView = self.mapView
00139 
00140         if ((engine.gameMode == 'play') and 
00141             self.mapViewVisible):
00142             mapView.set_property("visible", True)
00143             mapView.engage()
00144         else:
00145             mapView.set_property("visible", False)
00146             mapView.disengage()
00147 
00148 
00149     def setMapViewVisible(self, visible, tileX=-1, tileY=-1, sprite=micropolisengine.SPRITE_NOTUSED):
00150         #print "setMapViewVisible", visible, tileX, tileY, self.mapViewVisible
00151         engine = self.engine
00152         mapView = self.mapView
00153 
00154         if visible and (tileX >= 0) and (tileY >= 0):
00155             mapView.centerOnTile(tileX, tileY)
00156             mapView.sprite = sprite
00157 
00158         self.mapViewVisible = visible
00159         self.updateMapViewAdded()
00160
